title: Ukraine Invasion Is Putin’s Most Aggressive Move Yet to Restore Russia’s Place in the World
sub_head: The Russian president has sought for two decades to recapture status lost with the Soviet Union’s collapse
body:
MOSCOW—Russia’s invasion of Ukraine is President Vladimir Putin’s most aggressive move yet in his two-decade-long campaign to reassert Russia’s place in the world and redeem the humiliation of the fall of the Soviet Union.
It is an extraordinary gamble.
